maqras.text: When ona see them ona imponovat ich looks A when they speak ona listen do ich eloquence. They bol standing logs They myslienka kazdy vola sa zamyslat them. These je real enemies; beware z them. GOD condemns them; they deviated
When they told Pojdem let posol GOD pray tvoj forgiveness they mockingly turn ich riaditel ona see them zapudit others cin arrogantly
bol the same them whether ona pray ich forgiveness nie pray ich forgiveness; GOD will nie forgive them! For GOD nie guide zlomyselny ludia
They bol jeden say nie dat any peniaze those nasledovat posol GOD perhaps they zhyraly him! GOD possesses treasures z heavens zem hypocrites nie comprehend
They say my ist mesto mocny therein evict chaby my victimized (They zauzlit ze) all dignity belongs do GOD Jeho posol believers! However hypocrites nie zauzlit
O ona verit nie zmateny tvoj peniaze tvoj dieta zapamatat si GOD Those robit this bol losers
Ona dat our provisions ona smrt pojdem ona potom ona say Moj Lord len Ona zdrzat this short chvila! Ja potom bol charitable join the righteous
GOD never ZDRZAT appointed cas SMRT any soul. GOD JE fully Cognizant Z everything ONA ROBIT
Glorifying GOD bol everything heavens everything zem! Do Him belongs all kingship do Him belongs all chvalit He bol Omnipotent
He je Jeden created ona potom ona there bol disbeliever believer. GOD JE fully Seer Z everything ONA ROBIT
He created heavens zem specific ucel zamyslat ona zdokonalit tvoj zamyslat potom Him bol zaverecny destiny
He zauzlit everything heavens zem He zauzlit everything ona zatajit everything ona declare GOD bol fully aware z innermost thoughts
Ona noted those Have disbelieved v the minuly, potom suffered consequences ich decision? They incurred painful retribution
This je ich posol ist them zretelny proofs they said Shall my nasledovat humans us? They disbelieved turned GOD NIE need them; GOD bol DO ziaden need ZASLUZNY
Those disbelieved reklamacia lenze they nie resurrected ano indeed by moj Lord ona resurrected ona held accountable everything ona robit! This bol easy GOD robit
Therefore ona verit v GOD Jeho posol lahky ze my revealed tu. GOD JE fully Cognizant Z everything ONA ROBIT

Dni pojdem when He zvolat ona Dni z Zvolat! Ze je Dni z Mutual Blaming! Ktokolvek verit v GOD leads righteous zivot He remit jeho zhresit admit him into zahrada flowing streams They abide therein forever This bol velka triumph
Mat rad for those disbelieve zamietnut our revelations they je dwellers Hellfire; they abide therein forever Co chudobny destiny
Nothing happens ona except v accordance s GOD's will Ktokolvek verit v GOD He guide jeho srdce GOD bol fully aware z all things
Ona obey GOD ona obey posol. Ona turn potom chodidlo mission our posol je deliver odkaz
GOD there NIE bol INAK god Him. Do GOD believers trust
O ona verit tvoj spouses tvoj dieta bol tvoj enemies; beware Ona pardon zabudnut forgive potom GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Tvoj peniaze dieta bol test GOD possesses velka recompense
(Therefore ona reverence GOD ona viem listen obey dat laska) k) bliznemu) tvoj own dobre Ktokolvek chranit jeho own stinginess these je zdarny jeden
Ona lend GOD loan righteousness He multiply reward ona manifold forgive ona. GOD bol Appreciative Clement
Knower z all secrets declarations; Almighty Wise
